```{r, context="server"}
# Reactive simulation data
sim_data <- reactive({
  req(input$sim_participant, input$sim_trialNum)
  participant <- input$sim_participant
  trial <- as.numeric(input$sim_trialNum)
  
  # Check if simulation data exists
  if (!has_simulation_data(participant, trial)) {
    return(NULL)
  }
  
  # Get the simulation data
  get_simulation_data(participant, trial)
})

# Update data availability status
output$sim_data_status <- renderText({
  req(input$sim_participant, input$sim_trialNum)
  participant <- input$sim_participant
  trial <- as.numeric(input$sim_trialNum)
  
  cat("Status check: participant =", participant, "trial =", trial, "\n")
  
  tryCatch({
    if (has_simulation_data(participant, trial)) {
      data <- sim_data()
      if (!is.null(data) && nrow(data) > 0) {
        n_real <- sum(data$simulating, na.rm = TRUE)
        n_respawns <- length(unique(data$respawn_segment)) - 1
        paste0("✓ Simulation data available: ", nrow(data), " total samples (", n_real, " real, ", n_respawns, " respawns), arcDeg = ", 
               paste(unique(data$arcDeg), collapse = ", "))
      } else {
        "✗ Error loading simulation data"
      }
    } else {
      "✗ No simulation data available for this participant/trial"
    }
  }, error = function(e) {
    cat("Error in status check:", e$message, "\n")
    paste("✗ Error checking simulation data:", e$message)
  })
})

# Update variable choices when data changes
observeEvent(sim_data(), {
  data <- sim_data()
  cat("Observer triggered: data is", if(is.null(data)) "NULL" else paste("not NULL with", nrow(data), "rows"), "\n")
  
  if (is.null(data) || nrow(data) == 0) {
    updateSelectInput(session, "sim_vars", choices = NULL)
    return()
  }
  
  # Get available variable choices using the helper function
  tryCatch({
    available_vars <- get_simulation_variable_choices(data)
    cat("Available vars:", length(available_vars), "choices\n")
    cat("First few choices:", paste(names(available_vars)[1:min(5, length(available_vars))], collapse = ", "), "\n")
    
    # Set default selection with physics-relevant variables
    # Check against values (column names), not names (pretty names)
    default_selection <- c("q", "x", "e", "e_total_needed")  # arc position, plate-relative x, energy, danger
    available_column_names <- unlist(available_vars, use.names = FALSE)
    default_selection <- default_selection[default_selection %in% available_column_names]
    cat("Default selection:", paste(default_selection, collapse = ", "), "\n")
    
    updateSelectInput(session, "sim_vars",
                     choices = available_vars,
                     selected = default_selection)
    cat("Updated selectInput\n")
  }, error = function(e) {
    cat("Error in observer:", e$message, "\n")
    updateSelectInput(session, "sim_vars", choices = NULL)
  })
})

# Trajectory plot
output$sim_trajPlot <- renderPlotly({
  data <- sim_data()
  req(data, nrow(data) > 0)
  
  # Debug output
  cat("Trajectory plot: data has", nrow(data), "rows\n")
  cat("Columns:", paste(colnames(data), collapse = ", "), "\n")
  
  # Prepare axis limits
  xlim <- if (!is.na(input$sim_xlim_min) && !is.na(input$sim_xlim_max)) 
            c(input$sim_xlim_min, input$sim_xlim_max) else NULL
  ylim <- if (!is.na(input$sim_ylim_min) && !is.na(input$sim_ylim_max)) 
            c(input$sim_ylim_min, input$sim_ylim_max) else NULL
  
  # Use the plotting function
  tryCatch({
    plot_simulation_trajectory(
      data = data,
      frame = input$sim_frame,
      participant = input$sim_participant,
      trial = input$sim_trialNum,
      downsampling = input$sim_downsampling,
      xlim = xlim,
      ylim = ylim,
      fix_aspect = input$sim_fixAspect,
      plot_width = input$plotwidth,
      plot_height = input$plotheight
    )
  }, error = function(e) {
    cat("Error in trajectory plot:", e$message, "\n")
    plot_ly() %>% layout(title = paste("Error:", e$message))
  })
})

# Time series plot
output$sim_tsPlot <- renderPlotly({
  data <- sim_data()
  vars <- input$sim_vars
  req(data, nrow(data) > 0, length(vars) > 0)
  
  # Debug output
  cat("Time series plot: data has", nrow(data), "rows\n")
  cat("Selected vars:", paste(vars, collapse = ", "), "\n")
  
  # Use the plotting function
  tryCatch({
    plot_simulation_timeseries(
      data = data,
      vars = vars,
      downsampling = input$sim_downsampling,
      plot_width = input$plotwidth,
      plot_height = input$plotheight
    )
  }, error = function(e) {
    cat("Error in time series plot:", e$message, "\n")
    plot_ly() %>% layout(title = paste("Error:", e$message))
  })
})
``` 
